Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.ordermanager.ordermanager.model.pizza.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
Deluxe, Hawaiian, Pepperoni
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
An abstract class for Pizza. Deluxe, Pepperoni, and Hawaiian extend this class.
